item.title: Algebra | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Conquer Algebra Together! Join our group algebra homework help sessions: Small group classes (4 students)Expert instructor guidanceCollaborative problem-solvingBoost your grades and confidence with peers!

item.title: Banana Code Quest | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Banana Code Quest is a gamified coding course designed to teach young students real-world coding from the first challenge. Through engaging puzzles and adventures, students help a monkey catch bananas and outsmart various animals while learning fundamental and advanced coding concepts in a fun and interactive way. Key Features Real Coding Language: Students will code using CoffeeScript, a language similar to JavaScript but with a friendlier syntax, making it perfect for kids.

item.title: First Lego League/VEX IQ | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: First Lego League (FLL) is a Lego robotics competition for students grades 4 to 8. Teams engage in research, problem-solving, coding and engineering â€“ building and programming a LEGO robot that navigates the missions of a robot game. As part of Challenge, teams also participate in a research project to identify and solve a relevant real-world problem. Team members must be willing to work on all aspects of the competition and demonstrate the FIRST core values.

item.title: Geometry | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Geometry Homework Made Easy! Join Blue Ridge Boost's Group Geometry Sessions: Small groups of 4 studentsExpert help with your geometry homework Clear explanations of theorems and proofsHands-on problem-solving practice60-minute sessions weeklyCover all high school geometry topicsBoost your grades and confidenceTransform triangles and circles from foes to friends! Enroll in Blue Ridge Boost's Geometry Group today!

item.title: Math Boost | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: This class is tailored for students who are in the top half of the class, but need clarifications of some grade-level concepts. It offers reinforcement of key concepts through extra practice with typical grade-level problems, ensuring that students can grasp and master the material at their own pace. Additionally, students will have the opportunity to work on materials recommended by their classroom teacher and tackle problems suggested by Blue Ridge Boost instructors, providing a tailored and comprehensive approach to meet their individual learning needs.
